articles.title: AC Energy to spend up to $200M in venture to develop large-scale projects across Asia - GMA News Online
articles.description: AC Energy Corp. (ACEN) is set to invest up to $200 million in a joint venture with Germany-led ib vogt to develop large-scale projects in Asia Pacific, the Ayala-led firm announced Monday.
